title: Simulation-Based Science Team Training Course: Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science experiment methodologies and basic teamwork concepts
context.additional_context: Science experiment training course combining digital simulation tools with offline team activities. Provides real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in team collaboration skills while performing science experiment scenarios in simulation environments
Learners analyze team dynamics and develop improvement plans through self-assessment based on the Visual Analogue Scale (VAS)
Learners effectively apply team problem-solving strategies in three or more formative assessments with at least 75% proficiency
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
